alert.note: Alert for Upper Tanana Valley and the Fortymile Country (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued October 11 at 1:01PM AKDT until October 13 at 4:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM WEDNESDAY TO 4 PM AKDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 12 inches, with heaviest amounts expected in the Alaska Range. * WHERE...South of Chicken. * WHEN...From 10 AM Wednesday to 4 PM AKDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Low visibility with snow and blowing snow. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Around 8 inches of snow is expected in Tok and Northway. Lesser amounts of 2 to 4 inches from Chicken northward. Northwest winds up to 20 mph will develop Wednesday night with areas of blowing snow on Thursday.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected to occur. This will make travel very difficult. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Upper Tanana Valley and the Fortymile Country
